scripts.build:ui:powershell: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; cd ../frontend; npm run build; Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../backend
scripts.build:ui:wsl: bash -c "rm -rf dist && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cp -r dist ../backend"
scripts.build:ui:mac: rm -rf dist && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cp -r dist ../backend
scripts.build:ui:windows-cmd: cmd /c "(if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist) && cd ..\frontend && npm run build && xcopy dist ..\backend\dist /E /I /Y"
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
